sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个动词均含"唱"之意。
means: sing ： 普通用词，泛指一般的歌唱或发出悦耳的声音。
hum ： 指闭着双唇而不唱出字来，低语般的哼唱。

word_mean: 哼鸣：一种不清楚的长低音

sentence.Network_en: Hum, I am sorry but I thought you were French.
sentence.Network_cn: 嗯，很抱歉，我以为你是法国人。

sentence.Network_en: There was a general hum of conversation around them.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们周围的人都在嗡嗡地低声交谈。

sentence.Network_en: My general reaction to this news might be summed up as "ho-hum"
sentence.Network_cn: 我对这条消息的总体反应可以用“哼儿哈儿”来概括。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: imitative; related to the verb hum

entry.tran: 发出连续而低沉的声音;发嗡嗡声
entry.def: If something hums, it makes a low continuous noise.

example.ex: The birds sang, the bees hummed...
Within five hours, the equipment will be humming away again...
example.tran: 用不了5小时，设备就又能嗡嗡地运转了。

entry.def: When you hum a tune, you sing it with your lips closed.

example.ex: She was humming a merry little tune...
example.tran: 她哼着一支欢快的小曲儿。

example.ex: He hummed to himself as he opened the trunk.
example.tran: 他独自哼着曲子打开了车子的后备箱。

entry.def: If you say that a place hums, you mean that it is full of activity.

example.ex: The place is really beginning to hum...
example.tran: 这个地方真正开始热闹起来了。

example.ex: On Saturday morning, the town hums with activity and life.
example.tran: 周六早晨，小镇一派热闹繁忙，活力盎然。

entry.def: Hum is sometimes used to represent the sound people make when they are not sure what to say.

example.ex: Hum, I am sorry but I thought you were French.
example.tran: 嗯，很抱歉，我以为你是法国人。

means.word_mean: 1. the state of being or appearing to be actively engaged in an activity;

sentences.sentence: "they manifested all the busyness of a pack of beavers"
"there is a constant hum of military preparation"

auth_sentence.content: The crowd gets excited; its hum grows louder.
auth_sentence.res_content: The crowd gets excited; its hum grows louder.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The crowd gets excited; its hum grows louder.

auth_sentence.content: I have found...the persistent hum of the traffic...remarkably soothing.
auth_sentence.res_content: I have found...the persistent hum of the traffic...remarkably soothing.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I have found...the persistent hum of the traffic...remarkably soothing.

auth_sentence.content: This is not music to hum at the first listen.
auth_sentence.res_content: This is not music to hum at the first listen.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This is not music to hum at the first listen.

sentences.en: The bees were humming in the garden.
sentences.cn: 蜜蜂在花园里嗡嗡地叫。

sentences.en: She is humming a folk song that I never heard before.
sentences.cn: 她在哼一首我以前从未听过的民歌。

sentences.en: No one can hum him to draw his attention.
sentences.cn: 没有人可以用哼歌来吸引他的注意。

sentences.en: The new manager soon made things hum.
sentences.cn: 这位新经理不久便使一切都活跃起来了。

sentences.en: We hear the hum of conversation from the next room.
sentences.cn: 我们听到隔壁房间嗡嗡的谈话声。

jushi.english: The new manager soon made things hum.
jushi.chinese: 这位新经理不久便使一切都活跃起来了。

jushi.english: The bees were humming in the garden.
jushi.chinese: 蜜蜂在花园里嗡嗡地叫。

jushi.english: The market hummed as trading began.
jushi.chinese: 买卖一开始市场就热闹起来了。
